roleset.name: evolution within a species, sometimes resulting in new subspecies
roleset.note: MICROEVOLVE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: microevolve-v
example.text: In an experiment, the single-celled organism Chlorella vulgaris microevolved into a multicellular colonial form when a predator was introduced into its environment.
example.arg: when a predator was introduced into its environment
